original_text: Every third year you must keep safe a tenth part of all your crops. In the third year, you must give that tithe to the Levites, the foreigners who live among you, widows and the children who have no family. Then everyone who lives in your towns can eat all the food that they need.
korean_text: 셋째 해 곧 십일조를 드리는 해에 네 모든 소산의 십일조 내기를 마친 후에 그것을 레위인과 객과 고아와 과부에게 주어 네 성읍 안에서 먹고 배부르게 하라

sentences.original_text: Every third year you must keep safe a tenth part
sentences.korean_translation: 매 3년마다 당신은 십일조를 안전하게 보관해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: you must give that tithe to the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 십일조를 레위 사람들에게 주어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: the foreigners who live among you
and the children who have no family
Then everyone who lives in your towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신의 도시에 사는 모든 사람이

sentences.original_text: can eat all the food that they need
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들이 필요한 모든 음식을 먹을 수 있습니다
